Title: Ops Data Freshness Check
Rationale: Prevent stale safety-relevant operations data from being used in planning and decision-making
Acceptance_Criteria: For all safety-relevant ATA 02 datasets in scope: (1) maximum data age < 24h under nominal conditions, (2) breached threshold triggers an alert routed to defined roles, (3) ERP / degraded ops procedures are invoked for safety-relevant violations
